sentences.sContent: Writing a 15-page analysis about their professor's movie, hundreds of impromptu speeches, reading a 150-page literature book are quite normal for them.
sentences.sContent_eng: Writing a 15-page analysis about their professor's movie, hundreds of impromptu speeches, reading a 150-page literature book are quite normal for them.
sentences.sCn: 写出电影的15页分析，成百上千字的即席演讲，读150页的文学作品，这些对于他们来说都太正常了。

remMethod.val: 乐队迅速 (prompt) 准备好了即兴演出 → 即性演出

trans.tranCn: 即席演出， 即兴之作
